T02D2311:251a-0: @251a * // sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa bzhugs //
T02D2311:251a-3: bzhin bzang rnal 'byor brtson pas nga la nyon //
T02D2311:251a-4: legs so legs so khyod kyi mdzad pa legs //
T02D2311:251a-5: theg pa'i tshul chen thub pa'i gsung rab rnams //
T02D2311:251a-6: sgyu ma lta bur rgyal bas rab tu gsungs //
T02D2311:251a-7: chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu dang //
T02D2311:251a-8: rmi lam gzugs brnyan sprul pa lta bu ru //
T02D2311:251a-9: legs par shes na nyon mongs spang du med //
T02D2311:251a-10: rang grol ye shes thub pa'i dgongs pa'o //
T02D2311:251a-11: khyod kyis rde'u shing bu la sogs la //
T02D2311:251a-12: sbyor ba goms pas sngags kyis bsnun pa na //
T02D2311:251a-13: skyes pa bud mang rta dang glang po sogs //
T02D2311:251a-14: gzugs brnyan sna tshogs snang ba 'byung ba na //
T02D2311:251a-15: dang po gang nas kyang ni ma byung la //
T02D2311:251a-16: snang ba'i tshe na sgyu ma yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2311:251a-17: mtshan nyid gang yang yod min sgyu ma bsdus pa na //
T02D2311:251a-18: 'gags shing mi snang gyur tshe gang du'ang song ba med //
T02D2311:251a-19: bsdus te mi snang gyur kyang skad cig rgyud ma chad //
T02D2311:251a-20: de ltar snang dang mi snang gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid med //
T02D2311:251b-0: gcig gnyis yin phyir ji srid @251b rkyen nyid dang //
T02D2311:251b-1: nye bar gnas par snang tsam mchad nyid rdzogs //
T02D2311:251b-2: de bzhin smig rgyu zhes bya mtshan nyid kyang //
T02D2311:251b-3: sa phyogs tsha sgo can la nye bar gnas //
T02D2311:251b-4: nyi mas gdung dang ser bu'i 'jol phyogs 'bab //
T02D2311:251b-5: rgyang nas bltas pas chu klung gang bar mthong //
T02D2311:251b-6: de nyid byung dang snang ba 'gags pas kyang //
T02D2311:251b-7: snang dang mi snang dbyer med mtshan nyid gcig / rmi lam zhes bya skyes bu gnyid log pas //
T02D2311:251b-8: gnyid nang kun dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal //
T02D2311:251b-9: longs spyod sna tshogs rmi zhing snang gyur kyang //
T02D2311:251b-10: btson ra khri mon sdug bsngal sna tshogs snang //
T02D2311:251b-11: skye dang gnas dang 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe //
T02D2311:251b-12: don gyi cha gzhan bsgrub par byas pa med //
T02D2311:251b-13: gzugs brnyan zhes bya me long dag pa la //
T02D2311:251b-14: sna tshogs gzugs su snang bar gyur pa na //
T02D2311:251b-15: skye 'gag la sogs rnam gzhag gzhan med pas //
T02D2311:251b-16: snang dang mi snang dbyer med mtshan nyid gcig / sbrul pa zhes bya ye shes ting 'dzin nam //
T02D2311:251b-17: rig sngags grub pa'i mthu las byung gyur pa //
T02D2311:251b-18: me tog kha dog dbye ba'i rnam pa yis //
T02D2311:251b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs snang bar 'gyur //
T02D2311:251b-20: de bzhin phyi nang dngos po sna tshogs snang ba
T02D2311:251b-21: dag / ji srid gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par
T02D2311:251b-22: rtog pa yis // bag chags dbang gis nye bar gnas pa de srid du //
T02D2311:251b-23: dngos po sna tshogs snang ba 'byung bar gyur pa rnams //
T02D2311:251b-24: dang po byung tshe gang nas ma byung la //
T02D2311:251b-25: snang tsam nyid na bag chags dbang gis snang //
T02D2311:251b-26: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bag chags zad pa na //
T02D2311:251b-27: mi snang gyur tshe gang du'ang song ba med //
T02D2311:251b-28: khyod kyi sgyu ma sems dang sems byung dang //
T02D2311:251b-29: tshor ba 'du shes nye bar mi spyod cing //
T02D2311:251b-30: 'gro ba'i phung po sems dang sems byung dang //
T02D2311:251b-31: tshor dang 'du shes nye bar spyod pa can //
T02D2311:251b-32: mgo mi mtshungs zhes yid gnyis byed gyur na //
T02D2311:251b-33: mtshungs par gyur pa'i sgyu ma la sogs pa //
T02D2311:251b-34: drang srong dag la bha le bcol ba 'am //
T02D2311:251b-35: bzang po'i sgyu mas thub la gdugs tshod bul //
T02D2311:251b-36: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa sgyu ma'i snang ba yis //
T02D2311:251b-37: bye brag gyur pa med de mgo mnyam mo //
T02D2311:251b-38: smig rgyu dag kyang nyams kyi 'du 'phro yis //
T02D2311:251b-39: lam gyi bya ba byed kyang mgo mnyam mo //
T02D2311:252a-0: rmi lam dag la lha yis @252a * //
T02D2311:252a-2: ma 'ongs dngos po ston te bye brag med //
T02D2311:252a-3: gzugs brnyan pra yis sngags las grub pa yis //
T02D2311:252a-4: lkog gyur rkun mo'i gzugs mthong tha dad med //
T02D2311:252a-5: sbrul pa 'gro ba'i don du rgyal bas sbrul //
T02D2311:252a-6: bskal par gnas te mdzad pa sgrub pa yod //
T02D2311:252a-7: lo zla skad cig sna tshogs snang ba yang //
T02D2311:252a-8: sbrul par rtogs te bye brag mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2311:252a-9: de ltar sgyu ma 'dra ba'i dngos po sna tshogs kun //
T02D2311:252a-10: 'byin dang sdud dang 'phel bar byed pa yis //
T02D2311:252a-11: de ltar de la sdig pas yongs mi gos //
T02D2311:252a-12: bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin shes par bya //
T02D2311:252a-13: gang la sdig dang bsod nams gnyis med pa //
T02D2311:252a-14: de ltar gyur la byang chub rab tu gsungs //
T02D2311:252a-15: chu yis gnod la gzings kyis phan pa sgrub //
T02D2311:252a-16: chu med gyur tshe gzings kyis dgos pa med //
T02D2311:252a-17: de bzhin gnas ngan len gyis gnod kyi bar //
T02D2311:252a-18: sgyu mar shes pa gang la yod pa phan //
T02D2311:252a-19: gnas ngan len gyi gnod pa bral ba na //
T02D2311:252a-20: bsod nams sgyu ma lta bus dgos pa med //
T02D2311:252a-21: sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin mnyam pa ste //
T02D2311:252a-22: chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
T02D2311:252a-23: rang bzhin 'od gsal gzod nas 'dus ma byas //
T02D2311:252a-24: sgyu mas gos min yi nas sangs rgyas so //
T02D2311:252a-25: de ltar shes nas bdag dang dbyer med pa //
T02D2311:252a-26: phung sogs sgyu ma tsam du snang ba yis //
T02D2311:252a-27: de bzhin gshegs par shes pa'i blo ldan ni //
T02D2311:252a-28: lam gyi mchog tu rgyal bas rab tu gsungs //
T02D2311:252a-29: de ltar khyod kyi bya ba'i chos mtshon dpe //
T02D2311:252a-30: bden pas stong pa'i chos nyid gang yin de //
T02D2311:252a-31: nges pa'i don du yang dag stong par rtogs //
T02D2311:252a-32: chos kyi dbyings yin rnam par dag pa'i ngang //
T02D2311:252a-33: 'gro ba sgyu mas lam yang der gshegs nas //
T02D2311:252a-34: ye shes sgyu ma lta bus don byed shog /
T02D2311:252a-35: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tilli pas grong khyer grags
T02D2311:252a-36: pa skyong du sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa dngos
T02D2311:252a-37: po bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba rdzogs so//
